body:
Comment 5: 
I've removed the __chkstk_ms stub from tsan_go.cc and rebuilt the
race_windows_amd64.syso library.

It builds fine without the stub; the duplicate symbol error no longer occurs either.

I think removing the stub is the proper fix here.


I am running Windows 7 64 bit w/ MinGW64
Windows 64-bit

'gcc --version' reports:
gcc (Built by MinGW-builds project) 4.7.2

'go version' reports (Note: tip):
go version devel +c45fa194202f Mon Sep 09 20:36:19 2013 +0200 windows/amd64
